title: Dental Practice Management Agent - Phase 1 Foundation
description: Build HIPAA-compliant dental practice management agent foundation with skills documentation, API tools, and specialist agents

stories.title: Create HIPAA compliance skill documentation
stories.description: Document HIPAA compliance requirements including encryption, access controls, audit logging, BAA requirements, and minimum necessary determinations
acceptance: Includes absolute rules (never log PHI, encryption requirements)
Documents audit logging requirements with example JSON

stories.title: Create dental scheduling skill documentation
stories.description: Document dental appointment scheduling patterns including workflows, rules, and integration points
acceptance: Documents no-show rescheduling workflow with 7 steps
Documents integration points with PMS APIs

stories.title: Implement dental API tool handlers
stories.description: Create HIPAA-compliant tool handlers for dental PMS system integration supporting Dentrix, Open Dental, and Eaglesoft
acceptance: Implements execute_dental_api function with audit logging
No PHI in logs (only patient_id references)
Includes docstrings for all public functions

stories.title: Create dental scheduler specialist agent
stories.description: Build specialist agent for appointment scheduling operations using Haiku model
acceptance: Uses Claude Haiku model for cost-effectiveness
Task includes 4 responsibilities (no-shows, open slots, conflicts, workload)
Task includes workflow (7 steps from query to log)

stories.title: Create dental coordinator agent
stories.description: Build central orchestration agent that routes to specialist agents using Sonnet model
acceptance: Uses Claude Sonnet model for coordination
Task includes daily operations checklist (4 items)
Includes beads-patterns skill for task tracking

stories.title: Extend FastAPI server for Modal deployment
stories.description: Add dental agent endpoints to existing FastAPI server with Modal configuration
acceptance: Defines Modal image with anthropic, httpx, fastapi, pydantic
Includes helper functions for response extraction

stories.title: Create Cloudflare Worker edge router
stories.description: Build edge router Worker that calls Modal backend and handles auth, rate limiting, audit logging
acceptance: Implements fetch handler with Env interface (MODAL_ENDPOINT_URL, MODAL_API_KEY, DB, AUDIT_LOG)
Extracts practice_id and operation from request
Queries D1 for practice config and validation
Gets encrypted PMS config from D1
Calls Modal endpoint with full context
Logs to KV AUDIT_LOG with 6-year TTL
Includes error handling and rate limiting check
